medihoney-gel.name: Medihoney Gel
medihoney-gel.description: Promotes debridement and reduction of bioburden. Available on unit carts.

hydrogel.name: Hydrogel
hydrogel.description: Adds moisture to dry wounds. Available on unit carts.

iodosorb.name: Iodosorb
iodosorb.description: Absorbs drainage and promotes debridement. Comes from pharmacy.

santyl.name: Santyl
santyl.description: Enzymatic debridement. Apply in nickel-thick layer. Comes from pharmacy.

collagen.name: Collagen
collagen.indication: Chronic, non-healing wounds or stalled granulation
collagen.description: Stimulates ECM and encourages cellular migration to restart wound healing. Do not use in infected wounds.

silvadene.name: Silvadene
silvadene.indication: Superficial and partial-thickness burns, infected wounds
silvadene.description: Topical antimicrobial. Avoid in patients with sulfa allergy. Apply a thin layer once to twice daily.

betadine.name: Iodasorb / Betadine
betadine.description: Broad-spectrum antiseptic. Promotes eschar formation, prevents MASD. Apply sparingly. Can delay healing if used excessively.

triad-cream.name: Triad Cream
triad-cream.description: Protects periwound and intact skin from moisture damage. Ideal for sacral breakdown. Reapply after each soiling.

mupirocin.name: Mupirocin
mupirocin.description: Topical antibiotic effective against gram-positive bacteria.

gentamicin.name: Gentamicin
gentamicin.description: Topical antibiotic effective against gram-negative bacteria.

zinc-oxide.name: Zinc Oxide
zinc-oxide.description: Protective barrier cream for moisture-prone areas.

calmoseptine.name: Calmoseptine
calmoseptine.description: Moisture barrier and antiseptic for irritated skin. zinc oxide and menthol

ad-ointment.name: A&D Ointment
ad-ointment.indication: Minor skin irritation, early skin breakdown
ad-ointment.description: Vitamin-enriched ointment for minor skin protection.

desitin.name: Desitin
desitin.description: Zinc oxide-based barrier cream for diaper rash and moisture protection.

aquaphor.name: Aquaphor
aquaphor.indication: Dry skin, friction areas, minor wounds
aquaphor.description: Occlusive healing ointment for dry and damaged skin.

vaseline.name: Vaseline
vaseline.description: Pure petroleum jelly for occlusive moisture barrier.

medihoney-alginate.name: Medihoney Alginate
medihoney-alginate.description: Absorbs drainage and dissolves. Can fill tunnels. Rip or cut to fit. Storeroom (#103872 small, #103873 large).

gelling-fiber.name: Gelling Fiber
gelling-fiber.description: Absorbs drainage and becomes gel. Ribbon for deep tunnels. Storeroom (Aquacel #112580, Exufiber #201580).

hydrofera-blue.name: Hydrofera Blue
hydrofera-blue.description: Blue foam, absorbs drainage. Plain blue side touches wound. Obtain extra from SWAT.

xeroform.name: Xeroform
xeroform.description: Non-adherent, antimicrobial sheets. Useful for skin tears, burns, painful wounds. On unit carts.

prisma-promogran.name: Prisma Promogran
prisma-promogran.description: Dissolvable collagen matrix. Rip or cut to fit, premoisten before applying. Storeroom #135917.

silvasorb.name: Silvasorb
silvasorb.indication: Dry or desiccated wounds, superficial burns
silvasorb.description: Silver-impregnated gauze. Maintains moist wound bed, promotes autolytic debridement. Avoid in infected wounds.

alginates-silver.name: Alginates/Silver & Calcium/Supersorb
alginates-silver.description: Silver AG is antimicrobial. Helps with draining/bleeding wounds. Comes in sheets, strips, fluff, and rope.

aquacel-ag.name: Aquacel Ag/Opticel
aquacel-ag.description: Converts exudate into gel, promoting moist healing. Requires secondary dressing. Not ideal for dry wounds.

adaptic.name: Adaptic/Telfa Oil Emulsions
adaptic.indication: Fragile skin, graft sites, skin tears
adaptic.description: Nonadherent contact layer. Use when minimizing trauma during dressing changes is important. Apply over ointments if needed.

mepilex.name: Allevyn
mepilex.description: Absorbent cover dressing. Variety of sizes. Aggressive adhesive—use caution when removing. Available on unit carts.

tegaderm-absorbent.name: Tegaderm Absorbent
tegaderm-absorbent.description: For shallow wounds—first-line treatment for skin tears. Can be left in place for 1 week. Gentle adhesive. Available on unit carts/Pyxis.

duoderm.name: DuoDerm
duoderm.description: For shallow wounds with minimal exudate. Also comes in Medihoney version (Medihoney HCS storeroom #147573).

abd-gauze.name: ABD & Rolled Gauze
abd-gauze.description: Best for large areas, limbs, or dressings that require frequent changing. Available on unit carts.

telfa-pads.name: Telfa Pads
telfa-pads.description: Nonstick surface for moist, superficial wounds. Often paired with secondary gauze wrap.

abd-pads.name: ABD Pads
abd-pads.description: Layer of absorption. Not a primary dressing. Used over packing or as pressure padding.

kerlix-wrap.name: Kerlix Wrap
kerlix-wrap.description: Stretch gauze; allows breathable coverage. Can be used with saline as wet-to-dry dressing base.

coban-ace.name: Coban/ACE
coban-ace.description: Apply with caution; can impair circulation if wrapped too tightly. Use for edema or venous ulcers.

netting-stockinette.name: Netting/Stockinette
netting-stockinette.indication: Dressings on limbs or mobile areas
netting-stockinette.description: Elastic material that allows easy visual inspection of the wound while holding dressing in place.

foam-silicone.name: Foam/Silicone Bordered
foam-silicone.description: Cushions & absorbs moderate drainage, water resistant outside.

island-dressing.name: Bordered Gauze/Island Dressing
island-dressing.description: An adhesive edge with a nonadherent center to help hold the primary dressing in place and keep medications on.

compression-k2-dual.name: Urgo K2 Dual Compression System
compression-k2-dual.description: Two-layer compression system for venous insufficiency and edema management.

compression-k2-lite.name: Urgo K2 Lite Dual Compression
compression-k2-lite.description: Lighter compression system for sensitive patients or mild edema.

adhesive-remover.name: Adhesive Remover Wipes
adhesive-remover.description: Gentle removal of adhesive residue from skin without trauma.

alcohol-prep.name: Alcohol Prep Pads
alcohol-prep.description: 70% isopropyl alcohol for skin preparation and antisepsis.

calcium-alginate-plain.name: Calcium Alginate (Plain)
calcium-alginate-plain.description: Non-silver alginate dressing for absorbing wound drainage.

hydrofera-blue-ready.name: Hydrofera Blue ReadyTransfer
hydrofera-blue-ready.description: Ready-to-use antimicrobial foam with methylene blue and gentian violet.

antifungal-cream.name: Antifungal Cream
antifungal-cream.description: Topical antifungal for treating superficial fungal infections.

benzoin-tincture.name: Benzoin Tincture Compound
benzoin-tincture.description: Enhances tape/dressing adhesion and protects skin from moisture.

biopsy-punch.name: Disposable Biopsy Punch
biopsy-punch.description: Sterile disposable punches for skin biopsy procedures.

cohesive-bandage-tan.name: Cohesive Bandage (Tan)
cohesive-bandage-tan.description: Self-adhering elastic wrap that sticks to itself, not skin.

calmoseptine-catalog.name: Calmoseptine Ointment 1/8oz
calmoseptine-catalog.description: Small tube format of moisture barrier and antiseptic ointment.

fibracol-collagen.name: Fibracol Collagen Dressing
fibracol-collagen.description: Collagen matrix dressing that supports wound healing and tissue regeneration.

conform-bandage.name: Conform Stretch Bandage
conform-bandage.description: Lightweight stretch bandage for securing dressings without constriction.

dermal-curette-2mm.name: Dermal Curette 2mm
dermal-curette-2mm.description: Disposable curette for gentle tissue debridement and sampling.

dermal-curette-4mm.name: Dermal Curette 4mm
dermal-curette-4mm.description: Disposable curette for tissue debridement of larger areas.

hypafix-tape.name: Hypafix Retention Tape
hypafix-tape.description: Wide adhesive tape for securing large or awkwardly placed dressings.

tubular-net-sz6.name: Tubular Elastic Net Size 6
tubular-net-sz6.description: Tubular elastic net for holding dressings in place on arms/legs.

tubular-net-sz9.name: Tubular Elastic Net Size 9
tubular-net-sz9.description: Larger tubular elastic net for torso and larger body areas.

spandagrip-e.name: Spandagrip Compression Size E
spandagrip-e.description: Graduated compression bandage for support and edema control.

spandagrip-f.name: Spandagrip Compression Size F
spandagrip-f.description: Medium compression bandage for moderate edema and support.

spandagrip-g.name: Spandagrip Compression Size G
spandagrip-g.description: Higher compression bandage for significant edema management.

allevy-lite-4x4.name: Allevyn Life Lite Silicone 4x4
allevy-lite-4x4.description: Thin silicone foam dressing for wounds with minimal drainage.

allevy-lite-larger.name: Allevyn Life Lite Silicone (Large)
allevy-lite-larger.description: Larger thin silicone foam dressing for bigger wound areas.

silicone-foam-6x6.name: Silicone Foam with Border 6x6
silicone-foam-6x6.description: Larger bordered silicone foam for moderate drainage wounds.

silicone-foam-3x3.name: Silicone Foam with Border 3x3
silicone-foam-3x3.description: Small bordered silicone foam for smaller wounds with moderate drainage.

hydrocellular-foam.name: Hydrocellular Non-Adherent Foam
hydrocellular-foam.description: Non-adherent foam dressing that requires secondary dressing.

gauze-sponge-2x2.name: Gauze Sponge 2x2 (8-ply)
gauze-sponge-2x2.description: Small sterile gauze sponges for wound care and cleaning.

hydrocortisone-cream.name: Hydrocortisone Cream 2.5%
hydrocortisone-cream.description: Mid-potency topical steroid for inflammatory dermatoses.

catalog-hydrogel.name: Wound Hydrogel (Amorphous)
catalog-hydrogel.description: Amorphous hydrogel for adding moisture to dry wounds.

saline-irrigation.name: Saline Irrigation Solution
saline-irrigation.description: Sterile 0.9% sodium chloride for wound irrigation and cleaning.

island-border-gauze.name: Island Border Gauze Dressing
island-border-gauze.description: Sterile bordered gauze dressing with adhesive perimeter.

lidocaine-ointment.name: Lidocaine 5% Ointment
lidocaine-ointment.description: Local anesthetic ointment for pain relief during wound care.

silver-nitrate.name: Silver Nitrate Applicators
silver-nitrate.description: Caustic applicators for cauterizing small bleeding points and hypergranulation.

paper-tape.name: Paper Adhesive Tape 2 inch
paper-tape.description: Hypoallergenic paper tape for sensitive skin applications.

nystatin-powder.name: Nystatin Topical Powder
nystatin-powder.description: Antifungal powder for treating candida infections in skin folds.

ostomy-ring.name: Brava Moldable Ostomy Ring
ostomy-ring.description: Moldable ring for improving ostomy appliance seal and preventing leakage.

povidone-prep.name: Povidone Iodine Prep Pads
povidone-prep.description: 10% povidone iodine prep pads for surgical site preparation.

calcium-alginate-ag.name: Calcium Alginate with Silver
calcium-alginate-ag.description: Silver-impregnated calcium alginate for antimicrobial wound management.

gelling-fiber-ag-rope.name: Gelling Fiber with Silver (Rope)
gelling-fiber-ag-rope.indication: Deep tunneling wounds with infection risk
gelling-fiber-ag-rope.description: High-absorbent silver gelling fiber in rope form for tunnels and undermining.

skin-prep-wipes.name: No-Sting Skin Prep Wipes
skin-prep-wipes.description: Protective barrier wipes that enhance adhesion without stinging.

skin-closure-strips.name: Reinforced Skin Closure Strips
skin-closure-strips.description: Sterile adhesive strips for closing minor lacerations and incisions.

staple-remover.name: Skin Staple Remover Tray
staple-remover.description: Sterile staple remover with prep materials for safe staple removal.

saline-inhalation.name: Saline Inhalation Solution
saline-inhalation.description: 0.9% saline for nebulization and respiratory treatments.

xtrasorb-dressing.name: Xtrasorb Super Absorbent
xtrasorb-dressing.description: Super absorbent dressing for managing high levels of wound exudate.

sanicloth-wipes.name: Sanicloth Super Germicidal Wipes
sanicloth-wipes.description: Broad-spectrum disinfectant wipes for equipment and surface cleaning.

surgical-blade-15.name: Surgical Blade #15 Carbon Steel
surgical-blade-15.description: Sterile disposable surgical blade for debridement and minor procedures.

suture-removal-tray.name: Suture Removal Tray
suture-removal-tray.description: Sterile tray with instruments for safe suture removal procedures.

cotton-tip-applicators.name: Cotton-Tip Applicators 6 inch
cotton-tip-applicators.description: Sterile cotton-tipped applicators for precise medication application.

hydrocolloid-thin.name: Thin Hydrocolloid Dressing
hydrocolloid-thin.description: Thin hydrocolloid for superficial wounds with light drainage.

tongue-depressor.name: Tongue Depressor Blades
tongue-depressor.description: Sterile wooden tongue depressors for examinations and mixing compounds.

triamcinolone-cream.name: Triamcinolone Acetonide 0.1% Cream
triamcinolone-cream.description: Mid-potency topical steroid for eczema and inflammatory skin conditions.

unna-boot.name: Unna Boot with Calamine
unna-boot.description: Zinc oxide-impregnated bandage with calamine for venous insufficiency.

retention-tape-2in.name: Retention Tape 2 inch
retention-tape-2in.description: Non-woven retention tape for securing bulky or large dressings.

wound-cleanser-spray.name: Dermal Wound Cleanser Spray
wound-cleanser-spray.description: No-rinse wound cleanser spray for gentle wound bed preparation.

vashe-wound-wash.name: Vashe Wound Wash
vashe-wound-wash.description: Hypochlorous acid wound cleanser that's gentle yet effective.

wound-measuring-ruler.name: Paper Wound Measuring Ruler
wound-measuring-ruler.description: Disposable paper rulers for accurate wound measurement and documentation.

nasal-packing-iodoform.name: Iodoform Nasal Packing Strip
nasal-packing-iodoform.description: Antiseptic-impregnated packing strips for nasal bleeding control.

nasal-packing-plain.name: Plain Nasal Packing Strip
nasal-packing-plain.description: Non-medicated packing strips for nasal support and hemostasis.

gauze-sponge-4x4.name: Gauze Sponge 4x4 (12-ply)
gauze-sponge-4x4.description: Standard sterile gauze sponges for wound care and cleaning procedures.
